s.text: On its front page La Repubblica reported a warning Wednesday by Pope John Paul II that it was futile to try to predict the timing of the end of the world.
While most newspapers accepted the need for Britain to play its part in taking in eastern Europe's dirty nuclear washing, they argued that this particular matter had been badly handled.
